tooltip.programmable_magic.trigger_touch: Wait until a block is within 0.3 blocks of the spell entity
Wait until an entity is within 0.3 blocks of the spell entity
tooltip.programmable_magic.redstone_gold: Good mana affinity; used for basic magic parts.
tooltip.programmable_magic.rg_alloy_wire: A way to transfer mana; needs insulation...
tooltip.programmable_magic.debris_clay: Excellent mana insulation; for basic magic parts.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.velocit: Input the target entity and the velocity vector to add.
The vector length is the speed.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.apply_p: Applies potion effects to the target.
Input the target and a potion/splash/lingering/arrow stack; applies all effects.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.project: Deals damage on hit based on relative speed.
Input a metal nugget (Tags.Items.NUGGETS). Activates a projectile mark; handled per tick on hit.
Damage = relative speed × item count; cleared after a hit.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.explosi: Creates an explosion at the current position.
Input a number as strength; cube root used as radius baseline.
Warning: very large values are expensive.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.trigger: Waits until the spell entity touches a block.
Waits until the spell entity touches an entity.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.number_: A single digit used to build numbers.
No input; concatenates with adjacent digits.
Place multiple digits in sequence to form larger numbers.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.additio: Adds two numbers or two vectors.
Input two numbers or two vectors; returns the sum.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.subtrac: Input minuend and subtrahend, or two vectors; returns the difference.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.multipl: Multiplies numbers or scales a vector.
Vector scaling multiplies each component by the scalar.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.divisio: Divides numbers or divides a vector by a number.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.power.d: Input base and exponent; returns base^exponent.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.paren.d: No input; use matching left and right parentheses.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.separat: No input; only for separation and parameter collection.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.nearest: Gets the nearest entity around the spell entity.
No input; searches within a range and returns the nearest.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.dynamic: Dynamic constant: reads data from the environment
No input; directly produces a value for expressions
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.view_ve: Returns the caster's view unit vector
Points toward where the player is looking
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.caster_: Returns the caster position (with eye height)
Useful for building offsets or launch vectors
Combine with other spells to query attributes
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.spell_p: Useful when computing from projectile position
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.spell_e: Use to query its velocity, position, etc.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.entity_: Gets the entity's velocity vector (direction and magnitude)
Input an entity; returns its current velocity (blocks/tick)
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.set_sto: Writes a value into the current cast storage.
Inputs (value, index); index is a number, value is any type.
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.get_sto: Reads a value from the current cast storage.
Input (index); returns the value at that index (original type).
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.place_b: Places a block at the spell entity's current position
Input a block item stack; uses its default state
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.conditi: Condition modifier: invert subsequent condition results
No input; place left of a base/control spell as a modifier
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.equal.d: No type coercion; different types are unequal; doubles compare exactly
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.not_equ: No type coercion; different types are unequal; doubles compare exactly
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.greater: Both sides must be same type; vectors compare by magnitude
Both sides must be same type; vectors compare by magnitude
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.less.de: Both sides must be same type; vectors compare by magnitude
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.less_eq: Both sides must be same type; vectors compare by magnitude
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.and.des: Only the boolean constant true counts as true; others are false
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.or.desc: Only the boolean constant true counts as true; others are false
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.not.des: Only the boolean constant true counts as true; others are false
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.if.desc: IF expression: form X if ()(), X is the condition; code goes inside the parentheses
Takes 1 boolean on the left; scans right for two left parentheses as true/false branch entries
True: jump to the first paren's first spell; False: to the second's; pointer control only, no value
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.loop_st: Marks the start of a loop; pairs with Loop End.
Pairs at the same level to form a loop body
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.loop_en: Pairs with Loop Start; jumps back and continues next tick.
Returns to the nearest Loop Start and delays 1 tick
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.loop_br: Breaks out to after the nearest Loop End.
Stops executing the rest of the current loop body
tooltip.programmable_magic.spell.loop_co: Jumps to after the nearest Loop Start (next iteration).
Skips the rest of this iteration and starts the next
